text:
@senatemajldr House Democrats passed a serviceable aid bill more than 2 months ago. Responsibility for the current debacle rests specifically & squarely on the shoulders of the Senate majority leader, Mitch McConnell, Republican of KY, & the other 52 Senate Republicans.
https://t.co/wG0VJEfMSv
